summary: Internal FBI New York email chain discussing logistical planning for the execution of a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence for digital media and computer equipment. The emails coordinate timing, manpower, and mention that most of the requesting squad is in Florida interviewing victims.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York
persons.context: Participates in email coordination for the search warrant execution at Epstein's residence, mentions needing to swear out a warrant at EDNY.

persons.name: SSA FBI New York
persons.context: Coordinates the request for assistance to execute a search warrant at Epstein's residence, notes squad members are in Florida interviewing victims.

persons.name: Supervisory Special Agent FBIINYPD Violent Crimes Task Force
persons.context: Responds to the assistance request, indicates their unit is busy but that SA can assist.

connections.description: Coordination between FBI agents regarding the planning and execution of a search warrant at Epstein's residence.

events.title: Planned Search of Epstein's Residence
events.description: FBI plans to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence for digital media and computer equipment, scheduled for around 10 or 11 AM.
personsInvolved: Supervisory Special Agent FBIINYPD Violent Crimes Task Force

events.title: Coordination for Search Warrant
events.description: FBI agents in New York coordinate via email the logistics, timing, and manpower for the upcoming search at Epstein's residence.
personsInvolved: Supervisory Special Agent FBIINYPD Violent Crimes Task Force

keyFacts: The FBI planned to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence on July 11, 2019, targeting digital media and computer equipment.
Most of the FBI squad (C-20 Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking) requesting the search was in Florida interviewing victims at the time.
The search was planned for around 10 or 11 AM and was expected to take a few hours.
One agent mentioned needing to swear out the warrant at the EDNY (Eastern District of New York) courthouse.
The email chain demonstrates active, coordinated investigation into Epstein by the FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking squad in July 2019.
